RSVP_Text: Please fill out the form below whether you are coming or not, no later than May 8, 2025. Thank you!
VenueContent_text: The ceremony and the reception will be at this location.
MiddleBlockContent_text: On Pentecost Sunday at 16:00, the welcoming of guests begins at Gúthi Hunting Lodge. The ceremony and reception will be held at the same place.
OtherContent_section2_content: Primarily money, whatever amount you feel comfortable contributing to the event
OtherContent_section3_content: The usual: guest welcome, ceremony, games, dinner, and dancing until dawn
